name: Another Round
oracle_text: Exile any number of creatures you control, then return them to the battlefield under their owner's control. Then repeat this process X more times.
flavor_text: Weary travelers trade stories of the Eversaloon, an extraplanar respite that appears at the moment it is most needed.

name: Archangel of Tithes
oracle_text:
Flying
As long as this creature is untapped, creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.
As long as this creature is attacking, creatures can't block unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.

name: Aven Interrupter
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When this creature enters, exile target spell. It becomes plotted. (Its owner may cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost.)
Spells your opponents cast from graveyards or from exile cost {2} more to cast.

name: Claim Jumper
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When this creature enters, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then if an opponent controls more lands than you, repeat this process once. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

name: Dust Animus
oracle_text:
Flying
If you control five or more untapped lands, this creature enters with two +1/+1 counters and a lifelink counter on it.
Plot {1}{W} (You may pay {1}{W} and exile this card from your hand. Cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost. Plot only as a sorcery.)

name: Final Showdown
oracle_text:
Spree (Choose one or more additional costs.)
+ {1} — All creatures lose all abilities until end of turn.
+ {1} — Choose a creature you control. It gains indestructible until end of turn.
+ {3}{W}{W} — Destroy all creatures.

name: Fortune, Loyal Steed
oracle_text:
When Fortune enters, scry 2.
Whenever Fortune attacks while saddled, at end of combat, exile it and up to one creature that saddled it this turn, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.
Saddle 1

name: High Noon
oracle_text:
Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.
{4}{R}, Sacrifice this enchantment: It deals 5 damage to any target.
flavor_text: They both knew only one of them would walk away.

name: One Last Job
oracle_text:
Spree (Choose one or more additional costs.)
+ {2} — Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
+ {1} — Return target Mount or Vehicle card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
+ {1} — Return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to a creature you control.

name: Archmage's Newt
oracle_text:
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. That card gains flashback {0} until end of turn instead if this creature is saddled. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
Saddle 3

name: Double Down
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an outlaw spell, copy that spell. (Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws. Copies of permanent spells become tokens.)
flavor_text: The best alibi is being in multiple places at the same time.

name: Duelist of the Mind
oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
Duelist of the Mind's power is equal to the number of cards you've drawn this turn.
Whenever you commit a crime, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor_text: Nathan Steuer, World Champion XXVIII

name: Fblthp, Lost on the Range
oracle_text:
Ward {2}
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
The top card of your library has plot. The plot cost is equal to its mana cost.
You may plot nonland cards from the top of your library.

name: Geralf, the Fleshwright
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a spell during your turn other than your first spell that turn, create a 2/2 blue and black Zombie Rogue creature token.
Whenever a Zombie you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Zombie that entered the battlefield under your control this turn.

name: The Key to the Vault
oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, look at that many cards from the top of your library. You may exile a nonland card from among them. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.
Equip {2}{U}

name: Step Between Worlds
oracle_text:
Each player may shuffle their hand and graveyard into their library. Each player who does draws seven cards. Exile Step Between Worlds.
Plot {4}{U}{U} (You may pay {4}{U}{U} and exile this card from your hand. Cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost. Plot only as a sorcery.)

name: Stoic Sphinx
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
This creature has hexproof as long as you haven't cast a spell this turn.
flavor_text: Lucky travelers reported a mighty winged creature among the geysers. Unlucky ones didn't make it back.

name: Three Steps Ahead
oracle_text:
Spree (Choose one or more additional costs.)
+ {1}{U} — Counter target spell.
+ {3} — Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature you control.
+ {2} — Draw two cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text: She'd planned for every eventuality, with the obvious exception of failure.

name: Caustic Bronco
oracle_text:
Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. You lose life equal to that card's mana value if this creature isn't saddled. Otherwise, each opponent loses that much life.

Ward—{2}, Pay 2 life.

Whenever you commit a crime, create two tapped 2/2 blue and black Zombie Rogue creature tokens. This ability triggers only once each turn. (Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)

name: Insatiable Avarice

+ {B}{B} — Target player draws three cards and loses 3 life.

oracle_text: Whenever you commit a crime, exile up to one target black card from your graveyard and copy it. You may cast the copy. If you do, you lose 2 life. (Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime. Copies of permanent spells become tokens.)

more than ammunition to be expended.

+ {2} — Target opponent loses half their life, rounded up.

When Tinybones Joins Up enters, any number of target players each discard a card.
Whenever a legendary creature you control enters, any number of target players each mill a card and lose 1 life.

oracle_text:
Deathtouch

Flash

Menace
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, flip a coin. When you win the flip, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. When you lose the flip, Breeches deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to any target.

name: Eriette, the Beguiler

Lifelink

oracle_text:
Haste
Nontoken creatures you control have "{T}: Create a token that's a copy of target token you control that entered this turn."

Trample, haste

Flying, haste

oracle_text: Whenever you commit a crime, you may pay {1}. If you do, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard. (Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)

Menace
